name: Angry Shark Bite 3D
description:
Angry Shark VirtualReality 2016 ( VR ) is a game for cardboard.
This game has two option you can play this game as 3D and also in VR version.
Angry Shark VirtualReality(VR) and Angry Shark VirtualReality(3D)

This game is based on story from shark season when shark float in middle of ocean with there wide fins!!

sharks are the most biggest and deadliest animal on this earth.

Features Includes:
• 3d Sea and beach environment
• Great White shark or whale
• Aquatic animals including shark, orca, whale, Dolphin, Jellyfish and more.

Do a great dive in coral reef and feel the underwater world orca very indigenous manner

Hope you will love our new video for cardboard.

Please give us your feedback and download for FREE!!
